title: New install stuck on 62% applying patch
body: My computer messed up so I am installing on a new computer with windows 8.1. My install is frozen at 62% and says applying patches. If anyone has any idea I will appreciate it

replies.body:
Hey Istiophorus,

If you have been stuck at 62% for quite awhile you should try Riots Patcher KB. Follow the steps and it should fix you up, worked wonders for me! 

Patcher KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
Give it some time, patches can take a while. :)
